item.title: Announcing: JetBrains .NET Days Online 2025
item.description: üöÄ Excited to announce JetBrains .NET Days Online 2025! Join us on October 8-9 for a free, online event featuring practical talks, live demos, and expert tips from community speakers and the JetBrains .NET team. üîó Register here: https://lp.jetbrains.com/dotnet-days-2025 Don‚Äôt miss sessions on topics like Clean Architecture, Test Driven Development, and more! #DotNetDays #JetBrains #Programming #TechEvents #CommunityEngagement

item.title: Meet Databricks at Sibos in Frankfurt!

Don‚Äôt miss out! üçπüí° #Sibos2025 #Databricks #FinanceInnovation #Banking #AI

item.title: Unlock Unified Network and Security Analytics with Cisco and Splunk
item.description: Unlock unified network and security analytics with Cisco and Splunk! üåêüîç Join the livestream on September 17 at 9 a.m. PT, hosted by Adrian Illiesiu. Learn from Technical Marketing Engineer Taylor Cook as he demonstrates the Cisco Enterprise Networking app for Splunk. Discover how it integrates data from various Cisco platforms for enhanced network visibility and security management. Don’t miss out on the chance to ask your questions live! #Cisco #Splunk #NetworkSecurity #DevNet #LiveDemo

item.title: What Profitable Partners Do Differently
item.description: Join us at the Cisco Partner Summit 2025 in San Diego from November 3-5 to explore how profitable partnerships can enhance your business growth. The summit will focus on key questions guiding collaboration and the framework of “durable growth” to drive success. Gain insights from industry leaders and learn effective strategies for partnership profitability. üåüü§ù #CiscoPartnerSummit #BusinessGrowth #Partnerships #Innovation #Cisco

item.title: From Splunk to Cisco: A Seamless Transition in Career and Family
item.description: Excited to share insights from Vikram U.’s journey transitioning from Splunk to Cisco. He highlights the strong bond formed between both teams during the acquisition. Vikram also emphasizes the importance of Cisco’s generous parental leave, which allowed him and his wife to welcome their baby girl and navigate parenthood seamlessly. This supportive culture has made a significant impact on their family life. üë∂‚ù§Ô∏è #CareerTransition #ParentalLeave #Cisco #FamilySupport #WorkLifeBalance

item.title: GameDev Day 2025 Is Back in October!
item.description: üéÆ Exciting news for game developers! JetBrains GameDev Day returns on October 21, 2025! This free, one-day online event focuses on creativity, storytelling, and community in game development. Join industry professionals as they share valuable insights on various topics, from improving workflows to designing accessible games. New this year: local watch parties! Connect with fellow developers in your city while participating in this global event. All sessions will be streamed live on YouTube…

item.title: Your Voice Belongs Here: Creating Compelling KotlinConf Proposals [Livestream]
item.description: üåü Ready to elevate your speaking skills? Join the webinar “Your Voice Belongs Here” on October 14! This session is tailored for individuals from underrepresented groups in tech who have some speaking experience and want to present at KotlinConf. Learn what makes a compelling CFP, how to craft your proposal, and what reviewers seek. Connect, build confidence, and prepare to share your Kotlin journey! #KotlinConf #PublicSpeaking #TechInclusion #CFP #DiversityInTech

Discover the inspiring stories behind these innovative projects! #UnrealFellowship #GameDevelopment #IndieGames #GamingCommunity #Innovation

item.title: How Cisco Supports Work-Life Balance: My 21-Day Motorcycle Dream Trip
item.description: üåç Namita J., a Meraki Technical Leader at Cisco, shares her inspiring journey of a 21-day motorcycle trip across Europe. Cisco‚Äôs culture of trust and flexibility allowed her to take 30 days off without concerns about work. Her manager and team fully supported her adventure, ensuring a seamless workflow in her absence. This experience highlights how Cisco promotes work-life balance, empowering employees to pursue their dreams. üèçÔ∏è‚ú® #WorkLifeBalance #Cisco #EmployeeWellbeing #DreamBig…

item.title: A Heartfelt Thanks to Our Community of Builders

Thank you to everyone who contributes to this vibrant environment! üôå #Twilio #Innovation #BestWorkplaces #Community #Gratitude

item.title: Machine data: The next frontier in AI
item.description: üöÄ At #SplunkConf25, Cisco and Splunk introduced new innovations to harness the potential of machine-generated data. üîç Machine data is crucial for AI, yet it remains underutilized due to challenges like data silos and the complexity of integration. üí° Cisco aims to address these obstacles, providing the infrastructure needed for AI success. #AI #DataInnovation #Splunk #Cisco #MachineData

item.title: DoorDash takes part in the 2025 Disability:IN Conference
item.description: üöÄ This summer, DoorDash participated in the Disability:IN Conference for the first time, joining advocates and leaders focused on disability inclusion in the workplace. Our Able@ DoorDash group led the effort, with speakers Kinzie Keller and Lyndsey Leask sharing valuable insights on neurodiversity and creating accessible environments. We are committed to building inclusive products and practices, and this event provided us with new ideas to enhance our accessibility journey. Learn more about…

Tune in for valuable lessons straight from the experts. üìàüí° #TechUnscripted #CIOInsights #ITLeadership #Cybersecurity #DigitalTransformation

Check it out and immerse yourself in this indie creation! #Predator #FanFilm #UnrealEngine #Cinematic #IndieFilm

Yves Mertens emphasizes that this initiative strengthens relationships among Cisco, customers, and partners, addressing the growing cybersecurity skills gap. Special thanks to the project team and Cisco…

item.title: Register for the Global Webinar: How to Prepare for NVIDIA Generative AI Certification

Don’t miss this opportunity to enhance your skills! #NVIDIA #GenerativeAI #Webinar #Certification #ProfessionalDevelopment

item.title: Java Annotated Monthly ‚Äì September 2025
item.description: üöÄ Excited for September’s Java Annotated Monthly! This edition features updates on Java 25, set to release on September 16, 2025. Key enhancements include Compact Source Files, Flexible Constructor Bodies, and Scoped Values for better thread management. Additionally, IntelliJ IDEA 2025.2 supports these updates, including new debugging tools. Don’t miss out on the upcoming events and insights from Marit van Dijk! #Java25 #IntelliJIDEA #TechNews #SoftwareDevelopment #JavaCommunity

item.title: Java Annotated Monthly ‚Äì September 2025
item.description: üöÄ September brings exciting updates in the latest Java Annotated Monthly! This edition features the much-anticipated Java 25 release on September 16, 2025, highlighting new features like Compact Source Files and improvements in performance. Marit van Dijk shares insights on these updates and the support in IntelliJ IDEA 2025.2. Don‚Äôt miss this month‚Äôs tech news and upcoming events! #Java25 #IntelliJ #TechNews #Kotlin #SoftwareDevelopment

item.title: Leading design through disruption: A conversation with Sara Vienna, Chief Design Officer at Metalab
item.description: üöÄ Excited to share insights from my conversation with Sara Vienna, Chief Design Officer at Metalab! Sara reflects on her journey from a cold email to leading a top design firm. She emphasizes flexibility and continuous improvement in a rapidly evolving tech landscape. AI is reshaping design, prompting a redefinition of craft that focuses on user needs over time spent. Client expectations have also shifted, with heightened pressure on businesses to adapt. #DesignLeadership #AIinDesign…

item.title: Discover How Heroku‚Äôs AI PaaS Delivers Real-World Results at Dreamforce
item.description: üöÄ Heroku has transformed at Dreamforce into an AI PaaS, designed to enhance the shift from experimentation to production. Key highlights include new features like AppLink, Managed Inference, and Agents, all aimed at speeding up the delivery of AI-powered applications. Discover how companies like Workday and AT&T; are achieving significant results with Heroku‚Äôs solutions. Explore more at Dreamforce! #Heroku #Dreamforce #AI #TechInnovation #BusinessGrowth

item.title: JetBrains JavaScript Day 2025 Registration Is Now Open

Join us for insightful talks from industry leaders, covering topics from modern JavaScript tooling to open source project management. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to learn and engage! üìÖ Register now and be part of the conversation! #JavaScriptDay #JetBrains #JavaScript #TechEvent #WebDevelopment

item.title: AI Week 2025: Recap
item.description: üåê AI Week 2025 has concluded, focusing on how to harness AI’s power while maintaining control. Key announcements included new products and partnerships aimed at enhancing AI security and usability. üîí The event emphasized four main areas: securing AI environments, protecting original content, supporting developers, and improving Cloudflare with AI features. Stay tuned for updates on our Blog, AI Avenue, and CloudflareTV! üìÖ #AIWeek2025 #Cloudflare #AISecurity #TechInnovation #AI

item.title: Conference Hopping: Training Attendee Scanning Def Con
item.description: üö® The Black Hat NOC faces unique challenges, as it operates in a cybersecurity hub where scanning and ethical hacking are expected. Cisco is enhancing security with network-based telemetry to monitor diverse personal devices at the conference. An alert recently identified suspicious activity linked to a training session targeting an external IP associated with Def Con. #Cybersecurity #BlackHat2025 #Cisco #ThreatDetection #EthicalHacking

item.title: Driving Cisco XDR Integration With Third-Party Partners at Black Hat
item.description: Cisco is the Official Security Cloud provider at Black Hat USA 2025, showcasing its latest advancements in XDR integration. These integrations enhance the Security Operations Center’s capabilities, allowing analysts to quickly investigate Indicators of Compromise (IOC) with a single search. Special thanks to alphaMountain.ai and Pulsedive for their contributions to the event. #Cisco #CyberSecurity #BlackHat2025 #XDR #MalwareAnalysis üöÄüîçüíª

item.title: Cisco Secure Firewall: SnortML at Black Hat USA 2025
item.description: Cisco is the Security Cloud Provider for Black Hat USA 2025! Attendees can participate in hands-on training sessions, using cloud resources for real-time attack simulations. The Cisco team ensures stable connectivity and monitors traffic to protect against unauthorized attacks. SnortML, Cisco’s machine learning tool, demonstrated high accuracy, detecting over 100 attacks with only 21 false positives. Stay informed about cybersecurity innovations! üîíüíª #Cisco #BlackHat2025 #Cybersecurity…

item.title: Black Hat Training Attendees Scan Aviation Organization
item.description: üöÄ The Black Hat conference highlights the unique challenges of cybersecurity, particularly within its Security and Network Operations Center (NOC). Attendees engage in ethical hacking, leading to expected scanning and exploitation activities. This dynamic environment differs from typical corporate settings where such actions are seen as malicious. With a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) policy, comprehensive monitoring becomes challenging. The focus shifts to robust network-based telemetry for…

item.title: Black Hat USA 2025: 10 Years Protecting Black Hat
item.description: Cisco celebrates a decade as the Official Security Cloud Provider for Black Hat USA! üéâ Partnering with companies like Arista, Corelight, Lumen, and Palo Alto Networks, Cisco helps build and secure the Black Hat network. The NOC focuses on continuous network stability, delivering seamless security and visibility through an embedded SOC. üîíüåê #BlackHat2025 #CyberSecurity #Cisco #NetworkOperations #TechPartnerships

item.title: Refining SSO at Black Hat USA
item.description: üöÄ Exciting updates from Black Hat USA 2025! Cisco Duo has enhanced its role as the multifactor authentication (MFA) and single sign-on (SSO) provider for the Network Operations Center (NOC). The successful deployment of Duo Directory has expanded user access, supporting over 100 users at the event. This upgrade improves identity and access management for both users and admins. Key features include streamlined password management and a new Global Enrollment Policy to simplify onboarding. üîê…

item.title: Securing DNS With Umbrella at Black Hat
item.description: Cisco continues to enhance security at Black Hat, focusing on DNS monitoring since 2017. üåê With Umbrella, they route DNS traffic through a centralized service, gaining insights into potential threats like malware and phishing. At Black Hat USA 2025, encrypted DNS requests were blocked to improve visibility into user traffic. üîç The team prioritized monitoring the ApateWeb PUP delivery and phishing campaign, noting specific domain patterns. #Cisco #BlackHat2025 #CyberSecurity #DNS #Umbrella

item.title: Rebuilding homes and a resilient community in Western North Carolina
item.description: In Western North Carolina, Cisco Crisis Response and 40 Communities are aiding in the recovery from Hurricane Helene. üå™Ô∏è After the storm caused severe damage, affecting over 73,000 homes, a coalition was formed to support local leaders and nonprofits in the rebuilding efforts. üè† Nearly a year later, the focus remains on restoring homes, especially for low-income families, while ensuring vital services are accessible. ü§ù #CommunitySupport #HurricaneHelene #RebuildingTogether #CrisisResponse…

Their work will soon lead to journal publications! üìö The AI4SE program, launched in 2023, combines academic research with industry…

item.title: ICPC World Finals Livestream: ecnerwala and SecondThread Speed-Solving Kotlin Challenge

Don’t miss the chance to see Kotlin’s strengths and get inspired to join the upcoming Kotlin Heroes contest! #ICPC #KotlinHeroes #CompetitiveProgramming #LiveEvent…

item.title: Hack Week 2025: How these engineers liquid-cooled a GPU server
item.description: üöÄ Hack Week 2025 at Dropbox focused on the theme ‚ÄúKeep It Simple,‚Äù encouraging innovation and collaboration. One highlight was the “Liquid Cooling CPU/GPU Hardware” project, which won the Learn Fast award. The team developed a custom liquid cooling system for GPU servers to address the thermal demands of AI workloads. This system demonstrated significant benefits, including lower operating temperatures and quieter performance. Future plans include expanding testing across multiple data…

item.title: Ready for the Best School Year Ever? Join Our STEM Clubs, Camps, and Competitions

item.description: Rana K., a Technical Consulting Engineer at Cisco, shares her inspiring journey of fulfilling a childhood dream through the company’s Time2Give benefit. üåç‚ú® This initiative allows employees to dedicate 80 hours annually to volunteer for causes they care about. Rana, originally from Egypt and now living in Poland, has embraced this opportunity to teach and give back globally. She reflects on the connections she’s made, highlighting that cultural differences have not hindered her ability to…

item.title: Cloudflare Launching AI Miniseries for Developers (and Everyone Else They Know)
item.description: üöÄ Cloudflare has launched “AI Avenue,” a miniseries designed to demystify AI for developers and the general public. Each episode explores AI’s growth, capabilities, and human augmentation stories, making the technology approachable and engaging. Viewers can interact with AI hands-on, breaking down fears and showcasing its potential. Join the journey to learn more at aiavenue.show! #AI #Cloudflare #Innovation #Technology #HumanAugmentation

Ktor continues to evolve, offering support for modern scalable applications, including new features for dependency injection and server-driven UI development. For in-depth insights,…

item.title: Do any CISOs feel lucky?
item.description: Cybersecurity events like the RSA Conference and “Hacker Summer Camp” in Vegas are crucial for industry leaders. This year, CISOs expressed heightened concerns over nation-state threats and the impact of AI on security. Key discussions included resilience and anti-fragility in cybersecurity, with panels addressing AI‚Äôs role in enterprise threats. Informal settings also allowed for deeper conversations among CISOs about the practical use of AI and data protection challenges. #Cybersecurity…

item.title: The power of ten ‚Äî and the power of Purpose
item.description: üöÄ Cisco empowers employees through the Time2Give program, offering ten days off to volunteer and $10,000 in matching donations. In FY25, 81% of employees participated, contributing over 566,000 volunteer hours. This initiative not only supports communities but also enhances employee retention and recognition. Learn more about our impact and future goals for FY26! üåçü§ù #Cisco #CorporateResponsibility #Volunteerism #CommunityImpact #EmployeeEngagement

item.title: Supabase Launch Week 15 Hackathon Winner Announcement
